Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool

Class CreateGameWindow

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.CreateGameWindow
public class CreateGameWindow
extends java.lang.Object
AnchorPane displaying all the important objects connected with events to create players, add them to game and start the game. Each player is given a name through TextLabel, class through ComboBox and then added to game by clicking the "Add" button. Added player will be shown in ListView on the left. By left-clicking the player within the ListView, the player is selected and can be also removed from the game. "Start Game" buttons starts the game with all the players added to the ListView.
